/usr/bin/c++   -std=c++14 -pipe -fsigned-char -pthread CMakeFiles/event.dir/plugin/event.cxx.o -o event   -L/opt/root-cern_v6.24.06/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/opt/root-cern_v6.24.06/lib:/opt/root-cern/lib libdRICH_lib.a /opt/root-cern/lib/libCore.so /opt/root-cern/lib/libImt.so /opt/root-cern/lib/libRIO.so /opt/root-cern/lib/libNet.so /opt/root-cern/lib/libHist.so /opt/root-cern/lib/libGraf.so /opt/root-cern/lib/libGraf3d.so /opt/root-cern/lib/libGpad.so /opt/root-cern/lib/libROOTDataFrame.so /opt/root-cern/lib/libTree.so /opt/root-cern/lib/libTreePlayer.so /opt/root-cern/lib/libRint.so /opt/root-cern/lib/libPostscript.so /opt/root-cern/lib/libMatrix.so /opt/root-cern/lib/libPhysics.so /opt/root-cern/lib/libMathCore.so /opt/root-cern/lib/libThread.so /opt/root-cern/lib/libMultiProc.so /opt/root-cern/lib/libROOTVecOps.so -rdynamic
